column2: Language:        Proficiency in English is required as we are a global business           A Little Bit About the Role:                 Energy Studios Pack Shot Team is expanding the team with an off-shore Project Manager for their client Reckitt, a global FMCG company with multiple international brands house-hold names in its stable.              We are looking to recruit a Project Manager to work on this account as a dedicated member of the German team on a long-term contract basis. This is a remote role and you will be working closely with the team in Germany.          A great opportunity to work within an international team, creating impactful communications across many channels and developing best practices in brand communication for brands like DUREX, VEET and OTC products.              This role will be underpinned by passion and ambition, and those with experience in leading digital content, social campaigns and print within a creative agency will have an advantage.             The Project Manager is responsible for running creative and production processes and working alongside our existing talented Project Managers to drive a project from brief to delivery. The role is very client facing. The PM will be the main point of contact for their clients next to the Lead Account Manager. The candidate needs to have a good understanding of digital disciplines and is confident working in agency teams in a remote environment. You create timing plans within our system, assume responsibility for the review and approval process of creative output and ensure the projects you own, run on time and on budget.         You will need to be great with creative teams, hard-working and passionate about creative and producing the best product you can. Process is key, and someone who really respects and understands that, although creative needs freedom, it also needs to follow a framework and process to allow it to thrive.             What we want to see is a proven track record of producing multiple complex projects. You should have meticulous attention to detail, understand the importance of the profitability of your projects for the agency and you will have proven yourself as a safe pair of hands on the day-to-day running of multiple prestigious projects.             Most important, this role requires a courteous, positive and high-energy individual with great people skills. We value hard work, and we want to have fun doing it.             What Youll be Doing:                 Project Set Up                 Taking overall ownership of integrated creative projects from brief to fulfillment.             Being the key point of contact for brand teams             Working closely with strategy and creative teams in preparing advertising strategy and milestones for the client.         Liaising with clients to determine campaign scope and produce estimates and schedules.             Identifying, exploiting and managing ad hoc opportunities when they arise.             Estimating complex, cross-platform projects.                 Project Delivery             Schedule projects in line with the correct internal resource and help to source external resource where necessary.             Ensure projects follow the agency process and are completed on time and on budget.             Work closely with Digital Producers to unify skills needed to execute integrated campaigns.             Motivate and manage teams under tight deadlines.             Educate and manage internal stakeholders in relevant production processes where necessary.         Drive efficiency and creative excellence at all times.                 Reporting                 Provide job reporting to the Project Manager & Account Lead on a regular basis to ensure projects are running correctly, to budget and schedule.             Ensures they understand how to report and manage operational income for their projects in a timely and accurate manner.         Escalates any queries concerning invoicing, or estimates provided by the studio on their projects to the Project Manager Lead             What You'll Need:                 Excellent English Language & Communication Skills             Experience managing digital and integrated campaigns in a creative and production agency.         Understanding CGI and building Pack shots             Be unafraid to ask questions and have an innate ability to identify and manage project risk.             Strong track record in executing campaigns across multiple platforms.             Previous experience of Project Budget Management and Scheduling.             Previous experience of Resource and Production services sourcing.         Excellent client engagement skills with the ability to proactively organise and influence clients and build strong and effective working relationships.             Have a positive, can-do outlook, willing to leverage past experience to provide the best solution for each project you own.             Be willing to share your experience where relevant and when it adds to the offering to the client.             Be financially conscientious when managing the delivery of a project ensuring all relevant parties are aware of financial implications of delays, additional amends and re-briefs.             Be able to verify the qualitative and quantitative output of a project against the project objectives.         Understanding of how to integrate with a client-side team whilst maintaining a top tier agency service.         We are looking for people who want to work closer with clients and brands, who are entrepreneurial and relish the opportunity to be a part of something new and dynamic.             Personal attributes:             Confident and comfortable working in a fast-paced, changing client environment         A passionate and inspiring creative             The aptitude to learn new software and programmes efficiently and effectively             Self-motivated and organized             Collaborative team player             Proactive, helpful and enthusiastic                  Youll Have:             Creative and conceptional thinker.             Passionate about design             Confident and comfortable working in a fast-paced, changing client environment         The aptitude to learn new software and programmes efficiently and effectively             Self-motivated and organized             Collaborative team player             proactive, helpful and enthusiastic             Good to have:                 History of work in social media             Experience in FMCG             Multi-market experience         Experience in Automation a plus                 A little bit about us                     You can find us here:                                             Other essential points to note:         As we are working remotely, it is essential that the ideal candidate have the following in place to ensure there are no delays on delivering work timeously:               Back-up power supply, if necessary. column2: As a Software Engineering Project Manager, you will play a critical role in the planning, execution, and delivery of software projects. Your goal will be to ensure that all software projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget while maintaining the highest quality standards.       Responsibilities   :       Project Planning and Execution   : Define project scope, goals, and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans and manage all implementation processes including resource allocation, progress tracking, monitoring change control process, testing, documentation, training, and on-time delivery within budget constraints.        Team      Coordination   : Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects. Work closely with the software engineering team, guide them and resolve their problems to ensure the project stays on track.       Stakeholder Communication   : Act as the point of contact and communicate project status adequately to all participants. Maintain constant communication with stakeholders, keeping them up-to-date on progress and any changes in schedule.       Risk Management   : Identify and manage project dependencies and potential risks, proactively addressing issues that could derail the project timeline or impact budget.       Quality Assurance   : Implement and manage project changes and interventions to achieve project outputs. Maintain quality control throughout the project lifecycle, ensuring deliverables meet project standards and user requirements.       Requirements   :        Education   : Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering or a related field. Certifications in Project Management such as PMP (Project Management Professional) or CSM (Certified Scrum Master) are advantageous.       Experience   : Proven 3-5 years of working experience as a Project Manager in the IT sector, particularly in software development projects.       Technical Skills   : Knowledge of software development lifecycle (SDLC), methodologies like Agile or Scrum, and project management tools (such as JIRA, Trello).       Soft Skills   : Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills, strong written and verbal communication skills, solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multitasking skills.       Other   : Strong problem-solving skills, a collaborative mindset, and a demonstrated ability to lead a team and influence stakeholders.

Website link - https://blacklightsw.com/ Position : Project Manager Location : Noida Sector 9  Experience - 2+ years of experience in relevant field Job Summary :  - Develop detailed project plans, including tasks, timelines, and resource allocation, to guide the development team through all project phases. - Coordinate with cross-functional teams, including game designers, artists, programmers, and QA testers, to ensure project milestones are achieved on time and within budget. - Identify potential risks and challenges in the project and proactively implement strategies to mitigate them, ensuring smooth project execution. - Anticipate and resolve issues that may impact project delivery, making quick and effective decisions to keep the project on track. - Act as a bridge between different departments, ensuring clear and concise communication to facilitate efficient workflow and problem resolution. - Implement rigorous testing procedures to maintain the quality and integrity of the game, ensuring it meets design specifications and player expectations. - Conduct regular playtests and feedback sessions to identify areas for improvement and drive enhancements to gameplay and user experience. Requirements  Required Skills : - Proven experience as a Project Manager in the gaming industry, with a strong portfolio of successful games releases. - Exceptional project management skills, including the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and adapt to changing priorities. - Strong understanding of game development processes, including game design, programming, art, and QA testing. - Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to motivate and guide cross-functional teams. - Proficiency in project management software and tools. - Passion for gaming and a deep understanding of player preferences and market trends. - Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Benefits Why Us ? - High Growth Startup environment-  - Company sponsored courses and education material - Lots of learning opportunities-  - Work with a super-talented team of professionals - Informal work-culture, Casual Dress Code, multiple outings and trips - Performance Based Bonus - Competitive Salary - Medical Insurance for you and your family-  - Subsidies Lunch and Unlimited Snacks, Tea & Coffee in the house always

column2: PxD is looking for a    Project Manager    to join our team embedded within a government ministry. we're looking for a self-starter with excellent project management skills, and the ability to communicate with a wide range of stakeholders to drive adoption of digital agricultural initiatives at scale, with a focus on designing impactful and inclusive solutions.          The post-holder should have an understanding for and appreciation of digital technology adoption, scaling through government.          This role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of climate-smart digital agricultural strategy within India and make a meaningful impact on farmers livelihoods.          If you are passionate about working with the government to scale, leveraging evidence and technology, and committed to driving positive change in the agricultural sector, we encourage you to apply.               As a Project Manager, you will:                       Own end-to-end implementation of projects. Develop project roadmaps, work plans, manage      stakeholder communications, and budgets.            Develop and manage monitoring systems, in consultation with team leadership and PxD s cross-functional teams - including technology, programs and research.         Manage project contracts, grants and sub-partner monitoring functions.          Build strong relationships with a variety of partners, including at every level of Government.          Support the development of operational toolkits, communication materials and other tools that could improve the team s functioning.         Manage day-to-day operations within a Government setting.          Support a team culture of continuous improvement.          Contribute to PxD institutional knowledge management, internal learning efforts and general management and operational activities.          Supervise and mentor junior team members including field associates, technical staff, call center managers, among others.             The ideal candidate will be:                   Extremely organized: You will be managing lots of tasks and relationships. You will need to be organized to stay on top of them.         A proactive problem solver: You will need to notice when things need to be fixed, and then fix them, pulling in different teams at PxD as needed.          Personable and great with communication: you'll need to be clear and professional whilst communicating with various stakeholders around the world, both verbally and in writing.         Excited by work that demands speed, accuracy, and attention to detail.         A strong negotiator and decision-maker.          Interested in leveraging technology for impact.              We welcome candidates with an:                   MBA/MPP,    Bachelors degree or an industry-relevant equivalent qualification.           Proven experience at manager-level leading large programs and/or bringing individual projects to scale.          Experience with developing partnerships, communications and outreach.         Experience hiring and supporting a high performance team.          A background in strategic development.         Experience incorporating evidence gathered via research into user-centric program delivery; driving a culture of continuous innovation;          A familiarity with AI-powered solutions.

Project plans outline the scope, schedule, and budget of the project, as well as each party s responsibilities and mutual commitment to contribute adequate resources to follow the plan. Manage and assume accountability for all aspects of projects related to the delivery of client software and services including:     Acquiring and coordinating necessary resources to meet project needs.     Planning and tracking all project activity.     Guiding the client through release planning in support of the overall project schedule.     Tracking project hours and submitting project progress reports by due dates.     Monitoring and reviewing revenue recognition and bringing concerns to management as needed.     Managing scope, time, and cost to meet client commitments.     Managing communication throughout the team and stakeholders.     Managing the quality of project team deliverables.     Managing the project budget.     Documenting and reporting status and issues.     Identifying, reporting, and managing risks; overcoming project obstacles.     Acting as a client liaison and representative communicating client feedback to appropriate Tyler representatives; acting to resolve outstanding issues on behalf of client in a timely manner.     Conduct planning sessions with the client s key functional leaders to create a series of documented management plans that specify the project plan and scope.     May be responsible for ensuring assigned clients pay invoices in a timely manner and/or assist Tyler collections in obtaining payment for delinquent/past due accounts.     Ensure that resources are scheduled and monitor progress to ensure compliance with the project plan, immediately notifying affected parties of any schedule changes.     Use departmental sites/calendars/systems to publish a summary of key dates and issues to all Tyler employees involved in the project, such as development, implementation, support, and other project managers.     Obtain regular feedback from clients regarding project status and quality of service and take immediate corrective action as required.     Anticipate, identify, and resolve roadblocks, such as hardware, software, or networking incompatibilities and unresponsive third-party vendors or clients. Communicate with the implementation staff and management regularly, ensuring timely delivery of schedules and revenue projections; relaying personnel, client, contract, and departmental issues; seeking assistance as needed with meeting revenue goals; and responding to directives that are issued to meet department goals.     May manage implementation resources to maximize performance and deliver expected revenue goals. Solid conflict resolution, negotiation, business, and customer service skills including experience partnering successfully with clients on technical needs and delivering solutions tailored to client needs.     Organizational and time management skills including solid people management and project management experience involving the ability to manage project financials and multiple projects of various size, scope and complexity simultaneously and within budget. column2: We are looking for a Project Manager to manage the organisation of key client projects.      As our project manager, your job will be to coordinate people and processes to ensure that our projects are delivered on time and produce the desired results.      You will be the go-to person for everything involving a project s organisation and timeline.      Key responsibilities    Leading Project success - Ensuring that all projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget in coordination with the team which includes, but not limited to          Registration        Outreach Plan:    Crafting and executing outreach plan keeping the target audience in mind to reach the defined targets.              Number of Participants:    Keep track of participants, such as startups, professionals, freelancers, and students, who register and attend the hackathons.              Diversity of Participants:    Ensure a well-rounded and inclusive event by measuring the diversity of participants in terms of skills, expertise, industry, and location.              Number of Teams:    Monitor the number of teams formed during the hackathon, as this reflects the level of collaboration and networking among participants. column2: As an IT Project Manager, you will play a pivotal role in overseeing and managing various IT projects, ensuring their successful execution from conception to completion. As a Delivery Manager for VR & Metaverse, Web3 projects, you will be responsible for overseeing the development and delivery of immersive experiences for clients. All projects are done by our trusted set of partners.      You will guide, and work very closely with a team of developers, designers, and project managers to ensure that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.             Responsibilities         Lead the delivery, from conception to release, ensuring that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.     Manage a team of partner developers, designers, and project managers, ensuring that they have the resources, tools, and support they need to be successful.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, engineers, QA, and product owners to ensure that projects are aligned with business goals and priorities.     Develop and maintain project plans, schedules, budgets, and resource allocations.     Monitor project progress and identify risks and issues, proactively taking corrective actions to ensure projects stay on track.     Ensure that project documentation, including requirements, specifications, and design documents, are complete, accurate, and up-to-date.     Foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement, and actively contribute to the development of best practices, processes, and tools.             Benefits         Competitive salary and benefits package.     Opportunity to work on challenging projects with cutting-edge technologies.     Collaborative and inclusive work environment.     Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.     Flexible work hours and remote work options.         Qualifications         Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.     8+ years of experience managing software development projects, and must have relevant experience in immersive tech.     Demonstrated experience managing cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and project managers. Strong understanding of immersive technologies and their application in real-world scenarios.     Strong project management skills, including the ability to develop project plans, schedules, budgets, and resource allocations.     Excellent communication, collaboration, and leadership skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.     Experience with agile development methodologies, including Scrum and Kanban.     Experience with project management tools, such as JIRA, Asana, or Trello.     Familiarity with software development practices, including version control, testing, and deployment.

column2: Looking for a seasoned project manager with governance background to oversee the governance and project delivery for enterprise architecture function. This role will be responsible for ensuring the quality, consistency, and compliance of our architecture across the organization, architecture governance, as well as managing the project intake and tracking for enterprise architecture deliverables. Manager, office of architecture will manage a team of engineers and analysts and collaborate with other stakeholders within EA and GTBS.       Responsibilities:         Create, refine, and execute the internal processes of the enterprise architecture function, such as architecture reviews, standards, policies, and procedures.   Facilitate architecture review board to review new tools technologies and standards introduced.   Support the creation, delivery, and management of architecture operations processes, governance, and metrics/reporting.   Execute and report on architecture metrics including total cost of ownership for all applications within the organization.   Manage Application portfolio (APM) and application lifecycle.   Build and manage project intake process for all EA deliverables and light house project engagement.   Facilitate, tracking and reporting of deliverables for all EA functions.   Manage the financials of the enterprise architecture function, such as budget, project credits and IaaS spend.    Coordinate and collaborate with various stakeholders, such as business units, IT teams, vendors, and external partners, to ensure the alignment and integration of enterprise architecture with business needs and requirements.   Provide guidance and direction to the direct reports and foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement.   Communicate and present the enterprise architecture vision, strategy, and results to senior management and other audiences, and solicit feedback and input.   Research and evaluate new technologies, processed and trends, and identify opportunities and challenges for the enterprise architecture.         Requirements:         Bachelor s degree or higher in computer science, engineering, business, or a related field.   7+ years of experience in project management, IT governance, or a similar role, with a proven track record of delivering successful and sustainable solutions.   3+ years of experience in managing and leading teams, projects, and initiatives, in a complex and dynamic environment.   Strong knowledge and understanding of IT concepts, frameworks, and methodologies.    Experience in managing project deliverables and financials, such as budget, scope, schedule, resources, and risks.   Experience in working with various stakeholders in a large organization and ability to influence others.   Strong communication and presentation skills.

column2: The junior SWM specialist will be part of the proposed project and will be responsible for contributing towards implementation of this project in Trichy      S/he will support governance, strategic and operational planning, management of resources (people, physical and financial), development and delivery of the project outcomes      The core responsibility of this role will be to coordinate with the operations teams of composting centers, the Trichy City Corporation, and informal workers engaged in solid waste management      The incumbent will act as one of the primary links between the IIHS team and SWM stakeholders engaged on the ground in Trichy      This is a contractual position for an initial term of 11 months, renewable on mutual consent                  Activities and Tasks        Responsibilities would include, but not be limited to, the following:        Assisting the project management team in data collection, compilation, field work and other on-ground project activities related to Solid Waste Management (SWM);      Supporting the effective implementation of project initiatives, adhering to established timelines and quality standards;      Providing technical assistance to improve operations of Micro Composting Centers;      Collection of waste samples, technical analysis, and offering expertise in composting methods, waste segregation, and compost quality control to ensure successful project outcomes;      Identifying informal workers engaged in managing solid waste in Trichy;      Collaborating with the stakeholders to enhance the efficiency and inclusivity of waste collection, transportation, and processing activities;      Preparing detailed reports on the implementation status, highlighting achievements, challenges, and recommendations for improvement;      Organizing and conducting capacity-building programs for different stakeholders on Solid Waste Management (SWM);      Compiling comprehensive reports detailing the programs conducted, participants feedback, and outcomes achieved;      Supporting the project implementation team in execution of other solid and liquid waste management projects;      Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others;      Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and travelling on IIHS work as and when needed.              Structure and Reporting        The junior SWM specialist will be an External Consultant coordinating with the Project Manager at IIHS and will be required to collaborate with a diverse group of internal teams and external individuals/organizations.            Person Specification        The ideal candidate should have:        A Bachelor s/ Master s degree in a field relevant to solid waste management;      A total of 1 to 3 years of experience, ideally in solid waste management, environment or related development sector;      Prior experience in agriculture, composting or solid waste management (preferred), or strong experience in project management;      Experience of working in inter-disciplinary teams, preferably across practice implementation projects;      Strong oral and written communication, analytical and numerical skills;      A high level of organisational capability, including the ability to establish and maintain effective systems, procedures and processes and manage competing demands and deadlines without compromising quality;      A high level of communication and interpersonal skills, including the ability to consult and collaborate with inter-disciplinary and diverse teams, analyse and present information, and produce well researched high-quality reports;      Effective working knowledge in Tamil and English.

column2: 1. Project Planning:   - Define and clarify project objectives, scope, deliverables, and required resources.   - Develop detailed project plans, containing timelines, milestones, and dependencies.   - Create effective project communication plans to ensure clear instructions and expectations.     2. Resource Management:   - Identify the necessary resources (internal and external) required for project completion.   - Manage resource allocation and utilization to ensure optimal project productivity.   - Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to resolve any resource conflicts or challenges.     3. Project Execution and Monitoring:   - Supervise and motivate project teams, ensuring their adherence to project plans and schedules.   - Maintain project progress tracking systems, reports, and records.   - Continuously monitor project risks, issues, and changes, and develop proactive solutions.     4. column2: Project Planning and Management:           Define project objectives, scope, and deliverables in consultation with clients. Budget and Cost Management:           Monitor project costs and expenditures.         Ensure projects are delivered within budget constraints. Risk Assessment and Mitigation:           Identify potential project risks and develop risk mitigation strategies. column2: At Injala, the Project Manager is responsible for providing oversight to a team of professionals in completing projects by a set deadline to uphold business initiatives.      The duties include managing one or more projects to ensure the specifications are defined, made available to the engineering teams, the requirements are properly analyzed, a work-breakdown structure is created, proper estimations are done and, when the development work is done, that the work is verified for proper quality goals before a product is released to the market.      This is a cross-functional role where you liaise with multiple departments to achieve organizational objectives of managing projects with proper specifications, with the right quality and within approved budgets. You manage project risks.     Job Responsibilities:      Creating long- and short-term plans, including setting targets for milestones and adhering to deadlines.         Making effective decisions when presented with multiple options for how to progress with the project, especially when delays happen or obstacles are encountered.         Communicating with executives using progress reports to keep the project aligned with their goals.         Performing quality control on the project throughout development to maintain the standards expected.         Adjusting schedules and targets on the project as needed when external changes happen.         Responsible for the coordination and completion of projects on time within budget and within scope.         Deployment responsibilities include assisting customers throughout the various phases of the implementation process.         Will assist with all aspects of a deployment including (but not limited to): process configuration, feature/functionality demos, user interface configuration, user, and supplier setup.         Own the responsibility of customer satisfaction during the successful deployment of solutions.         Assist in the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant people and ensuring technical feasibility.         Manage regular development programs and urgent customer support tasks.         Coordinate with Product Manager and Account Team for product backlog grooming and prioritization.     Required Skills and Experience:      5+ Proven working experience in Project and/or Program Management.         Understanding software development lifecycle (SDLC).         Understanding Agile development methodology.         DevOps Management/Management and Project Reporting.         Project Risk Management.         Work-breakdown structures.         Understanding of Quality Assurance processes and execution.         Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multitasking skills.       We are inviting applications from fresh graduates to join our Talent Enhancement Program. After 6-months internship, you will be able to join ranks of our as your skills and performance enable it.    Personal Attributes:      Excellent listening, interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills.         A passion for continuous improvement.         Strong problem solving and organizational skills.         Self-motivated, quick learner who can manage multiple projects with minimal direction.         Be a self-driven individual with the go-getter attitude.     Educational Requirements and Experience:      Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science/Engineering or related fields.         Project Management certification (e.g. PMP, PMI-ACP) is preferred.     Benefits:      Open Door working Culture.         Early Joining Benefit.         Internal Growth opportunities.         Rewards Recognitions.         Events Festival Celebration.         Very good Referral Bonus.         Flex time policy.         Maternity Leave benefit.         No Sandwich Leave Policy.         Family Medical Insurance.

column2: To oversee the product, design, and engineering teams, we need a seasoned Project Manager.     Managing both people and processes, it will be your responsibility as our companys Project Manager to guarantee that all of our projects are completed and delivered on schedule. You will be the one everyone turns to when questions arise about how a project is structured or when it will be completed. Managing projects effectively is a skill you should have in spades. Your duties will include planning, allocating resources, supervising, and documenting the progress of the projects youre responsible for. To ensure the projects scope is being adhered to and that it is proceeding on time, you will be coordinating directly with higher management.     We need a technically proficient project manager to handle the whole project life cycle, from planning to completion. The technical project manager is in charge of sticking to schedules and keeping everyone on track financially. One of the most important qualities for a technical project manager is the ability to stay on top of everything. An effective technical project manager can switch between tasks with ease. He will manage the engineers and supervisors to ensure adherence to the, specifications, drawings and regulatory requirements as well as to ensure smooth integration.  He needs to focus on execution, quality, and management of Workforce, interdisciplinary coordination and safety for all disciplines.  You will decide on the organization of the work site and define the rules that need to be respected by all parties.  He will coordinate to resolve all issues on site and will manage commercial and contractual issues.   He will have overall responsibility for the Budget, Schedule, Quality Assurance/ Quality Control, Safety and reporting as related to the Power Plant.  He will work with company management to successfully coordinate and integrate the overall project scope.  Responsibilities:   Site Safety Management Risk Identification and mitigation During the Design Phase of the projects, the Project Managers role is to coordinate the different design aspects.  During the Construction Phase, the Project Manager role will be to manage the different workforce and activities that are performed during the construction phase.   Project Planning from Mobilization to Demobilization Site management on a multi- disciplinary level Cost Control and Value Engineering Quality Control The Project Manager will report to Project Director on a solid line basis for his day to day duties. Experience in managing and implementing EPC contracts Experience in coordinating multi- disciplinary activities and a proven ability to work across different departments and in an intercultural setting Experience with interconnection of process is required.  Experience in FIDIC conditions of Contract is preferred Education-   UG:  B. Tech/ B. E.  -  Civil

column2: Job summary         The project officer under the guidance of National Program Manager will provide techno-managerial support to the implementing partner and the key stakeholders for strengthening of the Migration project. S/he will develop, implement and review project activities coverage in states as per the project timelines and track the progress, in collaboration with implementing partners. This role involves travel to the states as per requirement.     S/he will oversee the implementation of the project in the mentioned project areas, working closely with partners/agencies and cross functional teams in Swiss Emmaus India both at national and sub national level to ensure effective delivery of the project in line with agreed budget and timelines. The project officer will be the person in-charge of project and will work closely with the National Program Manager and will directly manage the delivery and management of the project in close collaboration with cross functional team members and functions.      The project officer will support liaising and reporting to the donors, lead liaison with all project partners, and other key stakeholders, building strong relationships, overseeing the implementation of activities including research, communication, advocacy. S/he will collect and disseminate required information as required, ensuring that all activities are carefully coordinated and monitored on the ground.        Responsibilities           Support the program team and be the focal person to plan and undertake project in specified project locations as per the project design.         Support and strengthening of the projects strategy to fulfil the overall project objective and its quality parameters.         Provide techno-managerial support to identify issues, prioritize and assist in developing plans for improvement of routine activities in states.          Regular review of the program progress against targets, identify operational bottlenecks or risks, and work with NLEP division to strengthen the project implementation at the National and state level.         Support to states to develop plans for implementation of project activities in the specified geographical locations.          Participate in all reviews/meetings/conferences of project in coordination with the implementing partners.          Analysis and dissemination of project activity review and other associated data with partner agencies.         Undertakes field visits to the states to support project counterparts in periodic program review as well as to monitor implementation of routine activities         Carry other activities as suggested by the supervisor           Establish and maintain excellent working relations with the implementing partner and its team.         Work effectively with concerned government departments in the districts of intervention.         Establish and maintain cordial working relation with relevant stakeholders - Technical Agencies, Bilateral Agencies and other NGOs working in project geography.           Report the activities and financial progress as per the agreed schedule or requirements         Take lead in conceptualizing and organizing state/ district level consultations /workshops / conferences as required in the project.         Working with Swiss Emmaus India s communications team to ensure effective documentation of the work being implemented,         Produce high quality report to be shared with the donors and other stakeholders.         Ensure adequate inputs for the periodic reporting and progress update presentations including blogs, success stories, anecdotes and photos             Promote the work of Swiss Emmaus India communicating, both internally and externally, in an accurate, sensitive and motivating fashion         Understand and be an advocate, internally and externally, for the values of Swiss Emmaus India         Ensure that all activities comply with applicable law at all times, including compliance with data protection legislation         Other adhoc duties as required in line with your skills, experience and role       Qualifications and Skills     SEI seeks a results-oriented individual with the ability in producing high quality deliverables, managing multiple concurrent tasks, and meet tight deadlines with attention to detail. The successful candidate is required to have:         Post Graduate Degree in Public Health/Health Administration/Social Work         Prior experience of working with Centre/State government in policy/advisory role and experiences in project cycle management will be an added advantage         Proven ability in capacity building/training and programme monitoring and reporting.          Excellent interpersonal relations; ability to network, work in multi-cultural team environment, and work harmoniously with multiple partners.          Please indicate current expected salary and at least three reference in your resume.

       Project Manager Responsibilities               Determine and define project scope and objectives                 Predict resources needed to reach objectives and manage resources in an column2: As a Project Manager at Max Aircon Pune, you will play a pivotal role in managing HVAC projects from inception to completion.      You will lead a team of engineers and technicians, coordinate project activities, and ensure that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and meet quality standards.      Your strong project management skills and knowledge of HVAC systems, particularly Daikin products, will be essential in achieving project success.        Key Responsibilities:        Project Planning: Develop comprehensive project plans, schedules, and budgets in collaboration with cross-functional teams.      Resource Allocation: Allocate resources, including personnel, materials, and equipment, to ensure project objectives are met efficiently.      Client Communication: Act as the primary point of contact with clients, providing updates, addressing concerns, and ensuring client satisfaction throughout the project lifecycle.      Quality Assurance: Implement quality control processes to ensure that HVAC systems are installed and commissioned according to design specifications and industry standards, with a focus on Daikin products.      Cost Management: Monitor project costs and take proactive measures to control expenses, ensuring projects stay within budget.      Risk Management: Identify project risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize disruptions and delays.      Vendor and Supplier Coordination: Collaborate with vendors and suppliers to ensure timely delivery of materials and equipment.      Change Management: Manage project changes, including scope changes, and update project plans accordingly.      Documentation: Maintain accurate project documentation, including progress reports, change orders, and project closeout documentation.      Team Leadership: Provide leadership, guidance, and support to project teams, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.              Requirements      Qualifications:            Bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field.      Proven experience in project management, preferably in HVAC or construction projects.      Strong knowledge of HVAC systems and components, with a focus on Daikin products.      Excellent project planning and organizational skills.      Strong communication and interpersonal skills.      Proficiency in project management software and tools.      Problem-solving and decision-making abilities.

Assist Project Manager (PM) to ensure project requirements, standards, and documentation are followed     Assist PM to ensure projects are in scope, on schedule, and within budget     Provide an active role and use critical judgment in the development of all project deliverables     Ensure quality and timely submission of all project deliverables and documentation as assigned by the PM     Assist PM with reporting on the project status and health     Assist PM with identifying, managing, and resolving project risks and issues     Assist PM with monitoring quality assurance and change control processes     Proactively communicate with sponsors, team, and all other relevant stakeholders for each assigned project as directed by the PM     The Intern will learn from, and be supervised by, a mentor of the Project Management         Qualification & Experience:         A junior, senior, or graduate student currently enrolled in a program with a focus on project management or related field.     A strong interest in Project Management as a career is preferred     Prior work experience in coordinating or managing projects is plus     Provide assistance to Project Manager (PM) with project requirements, scope, scheduling, budget, risk management, quality assurance, and project status and health     Have an academic level of written and verbal communication skills     Strong interpersonal skills to actively listen, communicate in ways that foster trust and show flexibility     Team spirit and the ability to work with a group of diverse people, provide recognition and reward     Ability to work in a fast-paced, self-directed environment under deadline pressures     Ability to manage own workload independently, multi-task, and prioritize effectively     High computer literacy     Perform other project management related task and other duties as assigned by the supervisor         Key Skills :         Leadership, diplomacy, and motivational skills,Solid organizational skills including attention to detail, research, and multitasking skills,etc.

Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.         Proficiency in project management software and tools.         Sound knowledge of industry best practices and project management methodologies.         Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.         Problem-solving and critical thinking skills.         Attention to detail and strong organizational skills. Proven experience as a Project Manager in Web App Software solution.         Develop comprehensive project plans, including scope, schedule, budget, and resource allocation.         Define project objectives, deliverables, and success criteria.         Identify and mitigate project risks and issues. Provide regular project status updates to stakeholders and management.

column2: Self-dependence in choosing ways to achieve set targets. Nobody is going to give you a detailed plan with numerous instructions; you will get only the general direction to follow. Other personal strengths: systematic approach, ability to work in a team efficiently, quick learner, persuasive, flexible, sociable.      Knowledge of roofing and waterproofing market of India (polymer-bitumen membranes, synthetic membranes, liquid waterproofing, construction chemistry, etc.).      Experience of work as a technical specialist.      Technical or chemical education.      Willingness to travel (India).      Excellent knowledge of English (written and verbal). Analyze the materials of competitors and their properties.      Study Indian and International standards related to potential products (ISO, ASTM, EN, BS, etc.). Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and milestones, and regularly communicate progress to stakeholders. column2: Keeping the vision of the project intact and pulling the team towards it,  managing expectations,  during various stages of product development for great execution.   Keeping the vision of the project intact and pulling the team towards it,  managing expectations,  during various stages of product development for great execution.   Hey! We re really glad you found us. This just might turn out to be what we re both looking for.    In a nutshell,  ColoredCow helps startups bring their meaningful ideas to life. We design and develop digital products covering all aspects from idea conception through construction.   How project managers make a dent    managing expectations increasing the efficiency of the team The right environment for you    Ask anyone here and they ll tell you that you get the opportunity to captain your ship in this growth oriented startup. A non-hierarchical team structure will allow as much room for growth as you dream.   Our deeply ingrained human aspect of software development practices and work culture will provide support and development in your career. And hence,  rather than crunching tasks and marking checklists,  you will be orchestrating an execution that wins hearts alongside intelligent and passionate people. When we hear from others defining this role to be a number game or a sequence of steps to follow from theory,  it breaks our hearts. We see a scope of creativity,  experimentation,  personalisation in being a project manager. We just moved to the edge of our seats to hear you care for the same.   Do these excite you?    These skills are not exhaustive,  you might even be adding few more to this. And a +1 to you for that!   ??eing a great planner and keeping the team and clients on schedule    ??eing a people person    ??ommunicating effectively using the right mediums and channels    ??sking the right questions,  at the right time    ??hallenging the status quo to continuously improve the execution process    ??eing research oriented to know about the subjects and domains    ??ave an eye for detail,  to deliver delight in even the most unexpected areas    ??ias towards action and results    Past projects for you to check out    It would have been splendid to have you around on some of our previous exciting projects but that s the thing about journeys,  it s never too late to join in,    We don t believe in the age,  or years as the prerequisites to do great. Are you innovative and flexible to make things happen    ??on-experienced   If you re starting out we have insights and experience to propel you for your journey. We also have programs for you to experiment and find your calling in this field.    ??xperienced   If you already have a great experience then we would love for you to contribute in the growth and learning from the start.

column2: This will be a unique and possibly India s largest hotel development. It will include two hotels - one a luxury hotel and the second a business hotel. In addition to conference facilities in both hotels, the development will also have commercial/office space.          Our values shape the way we consult, and define the people we want to join us on our journey, they are:           Safety first - Going home safe and well:                You will be an advocate of Maces value of Safety First, and be accountable for leading and maintaining exceptional safety, quality, cost, programme, sustainability and project compliance standards.              You will possess expertise in local Health and Safety rules and regulations relevant to project portfolio.              You will champion a diverse and inclusive working environment, and understand the importance of the wellbeing of the people you manage.                Client focus - Deliver on our promise:                You will manage the delivery of key assignments and defined business areas, providing strategic direction and monitoring delivery aligned with overall vision and objectives.              You will support the long-term success of Planning performance for specified engines/sectors/hubs, and the overall contribution to the broader company goals.              You will support the planning function in ensuring projects and tenders are effectively planned, scheduled, and monitored.              Develops detailed plans taking full cognisance of logistics/site/project constraints.             Interfaces with project team, contributing to the production of the weekly progress report to the project team and understand functional obligations under form of contract.             Reviews and captures productivity to measure progress.             Communicates effectively with the client, project team and stakeholders.               Integrity - Always do the right thing:                You will support senior management in negotiations, contract development and other business development, ensuring that due diligence is applied.              You will support the long term development of strategy for a function or Business Unit (BU), creating a sustainable business future.              You will commit to making a positive impact for our people, our clients, and our planet, and take ownership for holding others to account who do not uphold the Mace values.              Incorporates sustainable design and procurement process within integrated programmes.             Establishes and oversees project work plan and deadlines.             Undertakes tasks required to full fill the requirements of the project/assignment.             Responsible for coordinating activities for team.                Create opportunity for our people to excel:                You will support your project team and provide an environment to share knowledge and experience.              You will actively network, innovate, and seek understanding of best practice, utilising the full depth of knowledge of Mace Group, the Centres of Excellence, Mace Way Control Centre and Knowledge Hub.              You will develop and maintain effective communication and collaborative relationships with the Client and other project stakeholders, both internal and external.                You ll need to have:               Bachelor s degree in civil.             Experience in planning and scheduling of any project of similar nature from start to handover.               You ll also have:               Extensive experience in the successful planning of projects and programmes in the construction sector.              Deep property or infrastructure project management expertise.              Strong commercial and financial acumen.              Leadership and management experience of large, diverse teams.              Experience of managing relationships with key senior stakeholders.            Knowledge of how carbon and sustainability considerations will shape the outlook of the projects you are working on.

column2: Job description         What are we looking for           You have a good understanding and work experience in AKS, Kubernetes, and EKS.         You are able to manage multi region clusters for disaster recovery.         You have a good understanding of AWS stack.         You have experience of production level in Kubernetes.          You are comfortable coding/programming and can do so whenever required.          You have worked with programmable infrastructure in some way Built a CI/CD pipeline, Provisioned infrastructure programmatically or Provisioned monitoring and logging infrastructure for large sets of machines.         You love automating things, sometimes even what seems like you can?t automate such as one of our engineers used Ansible to set up the Ubuntu workstation and runs a playbook every time something has to be installed.         You don?t throw around words such as ?high availability? or ?resilient systems? without understanding at least their basics. Because you know that words are easy to talk about but there is a fair amount of work to build such a system in practice.         You love coaching people - about the 12-factor apps or the latest tool that reduced your time of doing a task by X times and so on. You lead by example when it comes to technical work and community.         You understand the areas you have worked on very well but, you are curious about many systems that you may not have worked on and want to fiddle with them.         You know that understanding applications and the runtime technologies gives you a better perspective - you never looked at them as two different things.         What you will be learning and doing         You will be working with customers trying to transform their applications and adopt cloud-native technologies. The technologies used will be Kubernetes, Prometheus, Service Mesh, Distributed tracing and public cloud technologies or on-premise infrastructure.         The problems and solutions are continuously evolving in space but fundamentally you will be solving problems with simplest and scalable automation.         You will be building open source tools for problems that you think are common across customers and industry. No one ever benefited from re-inventing the wheel, did they        You will be hacking around open source projects, understand their capabilities, limitations and apply the right tool for the right job.         You will be educating the customers - from their operations engineers to developers on scalable ways to build and operate applications in modern cloud-native infrastructure.
column11: Ubuntu, Automation, Coding, Disaster recovery, Cloud, Infrastructure, Programming, Open source, Monitoring

column2: Purpose/Objective   As a talented AGM - Urban Designer at City Side Development, Adani Airport Holdings Ltd, you will play a pivotal role in the design and development of Master planning and Urban design projects.  You will work collaboratively with a multidisciplinary team of Architects, engineers, and project managers to create innovative and functional designs that meet the needs business needs and the highest standards of quality.  Your expertise in Urban design, design management, and stakeholder management will be essential to our success.  This work will cover a variety of sectors, including commercial mixed-use within brownfield context.  Key Responsibilities of Role   - Project Leadership: Lead and manage complex urban design projects from inception to completion, ensuring adherence to design standards, budgets, and timelines.  - Feasibility study: Generate creative and innovative urban design concepts that align with the project's goals, budget, and timeline.  - Master Planning: Lead the development and implementation of comprehensive master plans for Airport Real estate.  - Design Management: Collaborate with external consultant and Internal project teams to develop detailed master plans, drawings, and specifications.  - Analysis: Utilize demographic, economic, and geographic data to inform planning decisions and strategies.  - Strategy: Develop comprehensive urban design strategies, master plans, and zoning guidelines that enhance the functionality, sustainability, and livability of urban spaces.  - Land Use Planning: Assess land use patterns, zoning regulations, and policy frameworks to guide development.  - Transportation Planning: Integrate transportation solutions, transit-oriented development, and multi-modal transportation systems into planning efforts.  - Stakeholder Engagement: Engage with community members, government agencies, and stakeholders to gather input, build consensus, and address concerns.  - Policy Development: Contribute to the development of planning policies, guidelines, and regulations.  - Design Excellence: Develop innovative and sustainable urban design solutions that enhance the functionality, aesthetics, and livability of urban areas.  - Client Collaboration: Engage with clients, stakeholders, and community members to understand their vision and goals and translate them into actionable design concepts.  - Team Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior designers, fostering their professional growth and development.  - Research and Analysis: Conduct urban research and analysis to inform design decisions, incorporating best practices, emerging trends, and sustainable design principles.  - Sustainability: Incorporate sustainable design principles and environmental considerations into master plans.  - Regulatory Compliance: Ensure that urban design projects comply with zoning regulations, local codes, and planning guidelines. Technical Competencies   Urban Designing,Master Planning,Design management and time management,Drawing review and feasibility,Budgeting & Cost management  Qualifications and Experience   - Academic Qualification : B.  Arch & Master?? (M. Arch) in Urban Design from Reputed institute such as CEPT University & School of Planning & Architecture (SPA).  - Total 17 years of experience out of which 7 years of in Urban design, design management of urban design/master planning projects.  - Having delivered/design/design management for Hospitality led mixed use development, Business parks, Theme parks townships/master planned/gated communities in private / Public Sector will be an added advantage.  - Proficiency in building/planning, infra codes for Urban design, planning and building.  - Must have exhibited design and design coordination skills with various design stakeholders like landscape, traffic, infra (including PHE, Electrical etc. ) and SMEP.  - Experience in preparing design brief and feasibility studies.  - Demonstrable workplace experience of survey and analysis of sites, preparation of base plans and supporting material required for urban design and master planning work is essential.  - Ability to lead a design and independently manage design consultants.  - Experience of coordination with senior management, development authorities, govt agencies and similar stakeholders.  - Strong project management skills.  A thorough understanding of agreed project outputs, resource management, specific team responsibilities, delivery time-frames, tracking issues and risks, internal and external communication and escalation.  - The ability to communicate clearly and concisely, verbally and in writing, and to demonstrate competency in presenting ideas and concepts.  - Ability to prepare high quality planning documents such as Design Briefs, Access Statements, Design Codes and Parameter Plans.  - General understanding of Green/sustainability requirements w. r. t master planning.  - Proficiency with AutoCAD, Sketch Up, MS office and know how of Revit, GIS would be essential.

column2: Job Specification  Job title:Manager -Services  Job Location: Delhi/Kolkata/Mumbai/Bangalore.  Company Description  The company is one of the leading global suppliers of complete lines for the production and processing of flat carbon steel, stainless steel, and non-ferrous metal strip. Its lines consist of equipment for cold rolling, heat treatment, surface finishing, strip coating and finishing, punching and deep drawing, and for the regeneration of pickling acids. In addition, It supplies turnkey furnace systems for the steel, copper, and aluminum industries, as well as laser and resistance welding equipment for the metalworking industry.  They are globally leading supplier of plants, equipment, and services for hydropower stations, the pulp and paper industry, the metalworking and steel industries, and for solid/liquid separation in the municipal and industrial sectors. The publicly listed technology Group is headquartered in Austria, and has a staff of around 25,700 employees. It operates over 250 sites worldwide.  Roles and Responsibilities  Lead the Service business of the Company which includes but not limited to business development in the following:  Revamping and upgradation of equipment  Servicing old equipment  O&M business  Spares and lifecycle market In order to achieve this, it will be necessary to take care of the following activities:  Intracompany coordination (coordination with Product Experts, Manufacturing, Purchasing and Quality Assurance team as well as the Commercial Team)  Intercompany coordination (coordination of Group companies and Product Home as and when required)  Responsible for marketing as well as expediting and execution of the product.  The incumbent should be single point responsible for the specific account head but needs to coordinate with the product experts and other teams.  Responsible for the supplier Quality Control and Management (with the support of the Product experts and Quality engineering). Major Duties  Development of new market and improve the already established market  Periodic visit to old and probable new customers as per the plan to be worked out  Identify new technical / commercial requirements and take up the matter with Local / Overseas experts on the product.  Identify possible changes in the market and provide feedback on the same. Other Functions  Project kick-off meetings  Supplier manufacture kick-off meeting as and if required  Internal audit meetings  Quality internal meetings  Metals internal meetings Key Performance Indicator  Generation of quantum of business  Generation of new kind of business  Expanding the client base  Ensuring the Quality in the business  Ensuring and improvement of Gross Margin  Minimizing response time. Education and Experience:  Graduate / Diploma in Engineering ( Mechanical /Electrical/Chemical ) with 15 to 20 years experience of which at least 5 to 8 years should be in Processing plants /Furnaces, etc.  Desired Skills & Experience:  Excellent leadership skills  Client focus  Excellent PR with client and also within the company  Known to clients  Rich experience on Processing equipment and Furnaces ( CGL,CPL,PPL,Color Coating lines, Cut To Length line, Cold Rolling Mills, Reheating and Heat treatment /Forging furnaces , combustion system, etc.)  Be familiar with mechanical design  Good logical thinking ability  Familiar with MS Office  Good communication and coordination skills with suppliers and customers  Good experience in supplier workshop management and production management  Good team management and improvement experience If interested please send your UPDATED Profile with below mentioned details.  Current CTC:  Expected CTC:  Notice Period:  Reason for Job Change:  With Regards,  Reshmi-HR Recruiter  Aarna HR Solutions  Mob No: : 9902579718  Additional Information All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

column2: Job description         What are we looking for           You have a good understanding and work experience in AKS, Kubernetes, and EKS.         You are able to manage multi region clusters for disaster recovery.         You have a good understanding of AWS stack.         You have experience of production level in Kubernetes.          You are comfortable coding/programming and can do so whenever required.          You have worked with programmable infrastructure in some way Built a CI/CD pipeline, Provisioned infrastructure programmatically or Provisioned monitoring and logging infrastructure for large sets of machines.         You love automating things, sometimes even what seems like you can?t automate such as one of our engineers used Ansible to set up the Ubuntu workstation and runs a playbook every time something has to be installed.         You don?t throw around words such as ?high availability? or ?resilient systems? without understanding at least their basics. Because you know that words are easy to talk about but there is a fair amount of work to build such a system in practice.         You love coaching people - about the 12-factor apps or the latest tool that reduced your time of doing a task by X times and so on. You lead by example when it comes to technical work and community.         You understand the areas you have worked on very well but, you are curious about many systems that you may not have worked on and want to fiddle with them.         You know that understanding applications and the runtime technologies gives you a better perspective - you never looked at them as two different things.         What you will be learning and doing         You will be working with customers trying to transform their applications and adopt cloud-native technologies. The technologies used will be Kubernetes, Prometheus, Service Mesh, Distributed tracing and public cloud technologies or on-premise infrastructure.         The problems and solutions are continuously evolving in space but fundamentally you will be solving problems with simplest and scalable automation.         You will be building open source tools for problems that you think are common across customers and industry. No one ever benefited from re-inventing the wheel, did they        You will be hacking around open source projects, understand their capabilities, limitations and apply the right tool for the right job.         You will be educating the customers - from their operations engineers to developers on scalable ways to build and operate applications in modern cloud-native infrastructure.
column11: Ubuntu, Automation, Coding, Disaster recovery, Cloud, Infrastructure, Programming, Open source, Monitoring

Interacting with client about quality delivered and acceptance of same.     Managing project scope and change control and escalating issues where necessary.     Monitoring project progress and performance.     Providing status reports to the project sponsor.     Managing project execution within the defined budget. Identifying user training needs and devising and managing user training programs. column2: We are seeking a talented and experienced Greenfield HVAC projects Manager to join our team. As a company that specializes in the design, installation, and commissioning of HVAC systems in new buildings and facilities, we are looking for a candidate who can take responsibility in managing and executing complex greenfield projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in HVAC system design, project management, project Execution, project planning, regulatory compliance, quality control, and client communication, vendor management, managing the high and low side, mainly into residential and commercial buildings.    Responsibilities Responsibilities      Support in creating BOQs & taking quotations for site execution works from multiple contractors, which fit within the SJPL s execution standards criteria     Coordinating with the Procurement team for evaluation of service partners which are involved in or proposed for project execution at the site.     Relationship Management      Clients: Coordinating with the client s representatives to facilitate support during project execution works for system installation and BMS deployment      Holding regular meetings with customer representatives along with site-PM and understanding if Client is facing any problems or have any suggestions for improvement.     Service partners and Subcontractors: Maintaining good relationships with high quality, reliable and cost-effective service partners and contractors to ensure smooth functioning of works at site.     Execution      Executing all tasks related to site execution as instructed by the PM of their respective site/region to achieve target completion timelines      Service partner and subcontractor coordination for site related activities      Taking necessary steps for achieving weekly and monthly completion targets for all ECMs and taking course corrective actions wherever necessary to avoid delays      To execute projects with the objective of handing over ECM-Wise Snag-Free Projects to Operations Team     Recording all site-related expenses including ad-hoc cash expenses, as and when incurred     Ensuring proper branding is maintained and all spaces around Smart Joules equipment are neat and tidy.         Support in validating savings for each of the ECMs post commissioning using audit instruments, and based on methodology defined by Central Design team      Preparing and sharing necessary documents, as instructed, to your respective PMs for compiling a detailed project handover report to the Operations team.      Skills & Experience Required Experience      8-10+ years of experience covering a mix of project execution (preferably in HVAC and electrical utilities) experience, Service partner management & handling site execution, project execution and planning of the entire project.      Should have handled execution of 4-5 HVAC projects as project engineer     Knowledge and experience with service partner management & manpower management at site, for getting the works executed within timelines     Knowledge and experience with site engineering related concepts such as water piping, valves, pumping systems, electrical supply systems etc.     Strong computer skills (Web Search, Email, Word, Excel, Power Point)     Communication: Must speak English and Hindi, and the local language spoken in their region. Must be able to make effective presentations to a variety of audiences.     Knowledge of mass balance and heat balance, and other energy calculations     Knowledgeable about products, services, companies and people involved in HVAC high side system supply & installations     Knowledgeable about leading quality standards (ISO, ISHRAE, BEE) and certifications (LEED, NABH).     The candidate should have experience in managing projects from concept to completion or Greenfield Projects     B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering/ Electrical also preferred. The role is Manager and the person has to travel to various sites, so should be open for that. Skills & Behaviour      Fitment to SJPL Core Values     Communication: Must communicate effectively with variety of Stakeholders and customers     Courage to roll with the punches and keep going at it.     Pays major attention to minor details     Tenacity, reliability, perseverance, pursuit of quality. Be able to prioritize their own work, and focus on executing a particular task/project to completion under the pressure     Ability to multitask - Quickly understand the requirements of diverse stakeholders

column2: Brief Role :  Job Description:   The Project Manager will report to the Project Director.  The Project Manager will be based at site and will handle overall execution and management responsibilities related to construction, commissioning and startup of two STG power plants.   He will manage the engineers and supervisors to ensure adherence to the, specifications, drawings and regulatory requirements as well as to ensure smooth integration.  He needs to focus on execution, quality, and management of Workforce, interdisciplinary coordination and safety for all disciplines.  You will decide on the organization of the work site and define the rules that need to be respected by all parties.  He will coordinate to resolve all issues on site and will manage commercial and contractual issues.   He will have overall responsibility for the Budget, Schedule, Quality Assurance/ Quality Control, Safety and reporting as related to the Power Plant.  He will work with company management to successfully coordinate and integrate the overall project scope.  Responsibilities:   Site Safety Management Risk Identification and mitigation During the Design Phase of the projects, the Project Managers role is to coordinate the different design aspects.  During the Construction Phase, the Project Manager role will be to manage the different workforce and activities that are performed during the construction phase.   Project Planning from Mobilization to Demobilization Site management on a multi- disciplinary level Cost Control and Value Engineering Quality Control The Project Manager will report to Project Director on a solid line basis for his day to day duties. Experience in managing and implementing EPC contracts Experience in coordinating multi- disciplinary activities and a proven ability to work across different departments and in an intercultural setting Experience with interconnection of process is required.  Experience in FIDIC conditions of Contract is preferred Education-   UG:  B. Tech/ B. E.  -  Civil
